name: HEDERA HASHGRAPH LLC
sampleDescriptions:
H.R.4741 - Digital Asset Market Structure and Investor Protection Act 
Provisions relating to the regulation of digital asset securities and digital assets

H.R. 5045 - Blockchain Regulatory Certainty
Discussion of the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act of 2022 and the Lummis-Gillibrand Responsible Financial Innovation Act
digital assets and distributed ledger technology issues, no specific bills.
digital assets and distributed ledger technology policy matters. Feedback provided on the 'Digital Asset Market Structure' draft discussion proposal for regulation of crypto-asset markets.
